Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Pretty much...no. No think. Only talk.   Family gatherings often make me think of Ford Prefect’s musings near the opening of *Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy*...   >At first Ford had formed a theory to account for this strange behavior. If human beings don’t keep exercising their lips, he thought, their mouths probably seize up. After a few months’ consideration and observation he abandoned this theory in favor of a new one. If they don’t keep on exercising their lips, he thought, their brains start working.
